metadata.synopsis: The two waveservants close to the offerings at the temple entrance discuss taking the offerings to te cellar.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Walk towards the offerings chest at the temple entrance.

0.speaker: Seawind Star Stolitti
0.text: There's enough offerings in here for a trip to the vault - off you go, Fitzy.

1.speaker: Untaken Fitzy Relma
1.text: I was just about to, thanks. Wavemother's breath, you're so overbearing...
1.context: NodeContext: Slightly annoyed at being told what to do
